description:
Dennis and the others continue preparing for battle. Vigo thinks back on what he`s done to get this far.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Higher and Further Away a Place Is, the More I Aim to Reach It
Yori Tooku, Haruka ni Takai Tokoro Koso, Ore no Mezasu Basho Da
より遠く, 遥かに高いところこそ, 俺の目指す場所だ
